tool.name: iBridges browser for iRODS
tool.help:
**Interactive tool for browsing through an iRODS instance.**
When you run this tool, it becomes available as an interactive tool (running interactive tools can be accessed through Galaxy's menu: *User* > *Active Interactive Tools*). It allows browsing through the iRODS instance specified in the settings, and select a path by either:
+ copying it to the clipboard by clicking a copy-icon; or
+ copying it into the Galaxy-history by clicking an arrow-icon.
The tool automatically shuts down when you close the browser-tab in which it is running.
